trans-unit.resname: V17·1 | Archangel Avacyn | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flash Flying, vigilance When Archangel Avacyn enters the battlefield, creatures you control gain indestructible until end of turn. When a non-Angel creature you control dies, transform Archangel Avacyn at the beginning of the next upkeep.

trans-unit.resname: V17·1 | Avacyn, the Purifier | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying When this creature transforms into Avacyn, the Purifier, it deals 3 damage to each other creature and each opponent.

trans-unit.resname: V17·1 | Avacyn, the Purifier | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Wings that once bore hope are now stained with blood. She is our guardian no longer."\n—Grete, cathar apostate

trans-unit.resname: V17·2 | Arguel's Blood Fast | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {1}{B}, Pay 2 life: Draw a card. At the beginning of your upkeep, if you have 5 or less life, you may transform Arguel's Blood Fast.

trans-unit.resname: V17·2 | Arguel's Blood Fast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Arguel's vision led him into the jungles of Ixalan . . .

trans-unit.resname: V17·2 | Temple of Aclazotz | Card Text
trans-unit.source: (Transforms from Arguel's Blood Fast.) {T}: Add {B} to your mana pool. {T}, Sacrifice a creature: You gain life equal to the sacrificed creature's toughness.

trans-unit.resname: V17·2 | Temple of Aclazotz | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: . . . to the lost temple of a bat-god of night, eternal enemy to the Threefold Sun.

trans-unit.resname: V17·3 | Arlinn Kord | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +2/+2 and gains vigilance and haste. 0: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token. Transform Arlinn Kord.

trans-unit.resname: V17·3 | Arlinn, Embraced by the Moon | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Creatures you control get +1/+1 and gain trample until end of turn. −1: Arlinn, Embraced by the Moon deals 3 damage to target creature or player. Transform Arlinn, Embraced by the Moon. −6: You get an emblem with "Creatures you control have haste and ‘{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to target creature or player.'"

trans-unit.resname: V17·4 | Bloodline Keeper | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying {T}: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying. {B}: Transform Bloodline Keeper. Activate this ability only if you control five or more Vampires.

trans-unit.resname: V17·4 | Lord of Lineage | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying Other Vampire creatures you control get +2/+2. {T}: Create a 2/2 black Vampire creature token with flying.

trans-unit.resname: V17·5a | Bruna, the Fading Light | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you cast Bruna, the Fading Light, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flying, vigilance (Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)

trans-unit.resname: V17·5a | Bruna, the Fading Light | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She now sees only Emrakul's visions.

trans-unit.resname: V17·5b | Brisela, Voice of Nightmares | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When you cast Bruna, the Fading Light, you may return target Angel or Human creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield. Flying, vigilance (Melds with Gisela, the Broken Blade.)

trans-unit.resname: V17·5b | Brisela, Voice of Nightmares | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Upon discovering what had become of her sisters, Sigarda could only weep.

trans-unit.resname: V17·6 | Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a red spell, untap Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh. {T}: Chandra, Fire of Kaladesh deals 1 damage to target player. If Chandra has dealt 3 or more damage this turn, exile her, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: V17·6 | Chandra, Roaring Flame | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target player. −2: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 2 damage to target creature. −7: Chandra, Roaring Flame deals 6 damage to each opponent. Each player dealt damage this way gets an emblem with "At the beginning of your upkeep, this emblem deals 3 damage to you."

trans-unit.resname: V17·7 | Delver of Secrets | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, look at the top card of your library. You may reveal that card. If an instant or sorcery card is revealed this way, transform Delver of Secrets.

trans-unit.resname: V17·7 | Insectile Aberration | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying

trans-unit.resname: V17·7 | Insectile Aberration | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Unfortunately, all my test animals have died or escaped, so I shall be the final subject. I feel no fear. This is a momentous night."\n—Laboratory notes, final entry

trans-unit.resname: V17·8 | Elbrus, the Binding Blade | Card Text
V17·8 | Elbrus, the Binding Blade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Those who grasp its hilt soon hear the demon's call.

trans-unit.resname: V17·8 | Withengar Unbound | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, intimidate, trample Whenever a player loses the game, put thirteen +1/+1 counters on Withengar Unbound.

trans-unit.resname: V17·8 | Withengar Unbound | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: There are not enough lives on Innistrad to satisfy his thirst for retribution.

trans-unit.resname: V17·9 | Garruk Relentless | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Garruk Relentless has two or fewer loyalty counters on him, transform him. 0: Garruk Relentless deals 3 damage to target creature. That creature deals damage equal to its power to him. 0: Create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token.

trans-unit.resname: V17·9 | Garruk, the Veil-Cursed | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Create a 1/1 black Wolf creature token with deathtouch. −1: Sacrifice a creature. If you do, search your library for a creature card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. −3: Creatures you control gain trample and get +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of creature cards in your graveyard.

trans-unit.resname: V17·10 | Gisela, the Broken Blade | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Flying, first strike, lifelink At the beginning of your end step, if you both own and control Gisela, the Broken Blade and a creature named Bruna, the Fading Light, exile them, then meld them into Brisela, Voice of Nightmares.

trans-unit.resname: V17·10 | Gisela, the Broken Blade | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: She now hears only Emrakul's murmurs.

trans-unit.resname: V17·11 | Huntmaster of the Fells | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever this creature enters the battlefield or transforms into Huntmaster of the Fells, create a 2/2 green Wolf creature token and you gain 2 life. At the beginning of each upkeep, if no spells were cast last turn, transform Huntmaster of the Fells.

trans-unit.resname: V17·11 | Ravager of the Fells | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Trample Whenever this creature transforms into Ravager of the Fells, it deals 2 damage to target opponent and 2 damage to up to one target creature that player controls. At the beginning of each upkeep, if a player cast two or more spells last turn, transform Ravager of the Fells.

trans-unit.resname: V17·12 | Jace, Vryn's Prodigy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card. If there are five or more cards in your graveyard, exile Jace, Vryn's Prodigy, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: V17·12 | Jace, Vryn's Prodigy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "People's thoughts just come to me. Sometimes I don't know if it's them or me thinking."

trans-unit.resname: V17·12 | Jace, Telepath Unbound | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Up to one target creature gets -2/-0 until your next turn. −3: You may cast target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard this turn. If that card would be put into your graveyard this turn, exile it instead. −9: You get an emblem with "Whenever you cast a spell, target opponent puts the top five cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard."

trans-unit.resname: V17·13 | Kytheon, Hero of Akros | Card Text
trans-unit.source: At end of combat, if Kytheon, Hero of Akros and at least two other creatures attacked this combat, exile Kytheon, then return him to the battlefield transformed under his owner's control. {2}{W}: Kytheon gains indestructible until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: V17·13 | Gideon, Battle-Forged | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +2: Up to one target creature an opponent controls attacks Gideon, Battle-Forged during its controller's next turn if able. +1: Until your next turn, target creature gains indestructible. Untap that creature. 0: Until end of turn, Gideon, Battle-Forged becomes a 4/4 Human Soldier creature with indestructible that's still a planeswalker. Prevent all damage that would be dealt to him this turn.

trans-unit.resname: V17·14 | Liliana, Heretical Healer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Lifelink Whenever another nontoken creature you control dies, exile Liliana, Heretical Healer, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control. If you do, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

trans-unit.resname: V17·14 | Liliana, Defiant Necromancer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +2: Each player discards a card. −X: Return target nonlegendary creature card with converted mana cost X from your graveyard to the battlefield. −8: You get an emblem with "Whenever a creature dies, return it to the battlefield under your control at the beginning of the next end step."

trans-unit.resname: V17·15 | Nissa, Vastwood Seer | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Nissa, Vastwood Seer enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic Forest card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library. Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, exile Nissa, then return her to the battlefield transformed under her owner's control.

trans-unit.resname: V17·15 | Nissa, Sage Animist | Card Text
trans-unit.source: +1: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield. Otherwise, put it into your hand. −2: Create a legendary 4/4 green Elemental creature token named Ashaya, the Awoken World. −7: Untap up to six target lands. They become 6/6 Elemental creatures. They're still lands.
